resources.b1d: By installing the application working with OsMo, share your location easily
resources.b2d: When you start sending coordinates, generated links of the form https://osmo.mobi/s/**_***_** it is valid until you complete the trip
resources.b3d: If you need to give permanent access to your location, you can create a Permalink, it will always show your location. The current or saved if you shut down sending coordinates. The link works forever until it is deleted.
resources.gtk0: Every time you start and stop monitoring in our system submitted in a separate "trip"
resources.gtk1: At the same time not one authorized device or one account can have only one trip
resources.gtk2: After the trip started, for 24 hours, must be sent at least one coordinate, otherwise it is deemed null and will be removed
resources.gtk3: The maximum number of points per trip ~200 000, then it can be forcibly terminated
resources.gtk4: If not authorized, the device does not send coordinates within 12 hours, the trip is automatically terminated
resources.gtk5: If the account is not received coordinate within 36 hours, the trip is automatically terminated
resources.gtk6: If the majority of the points sent in the last 24 hours will be with zero speed - the drive is considered useless, and the device can be locked
resources.session_ended_description: To continue to observe this unit you can ask for a link to a new session, the permanent link or log in with a user in one group
resources.personal_not_found_description: You may ask whoever you sent it new
